article.title: Lockheed to Provide Autonomous Technologies for Unmanned Planes
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin, Mission System and Sensors, Owego, New York, was awarded a $47 million contract to provide autonomous technologies for unmanned aerial systems to maximize performance requirements and capabilities with mature technologies.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Eustis, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
